channel.title: Helium Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 3 (21)
item.description:
This update:
  • "Open in Helium" from Safari with the built-in share extension!
  • Stays on top even as you switch between spacesâ€”even full screen ones! (This can be disabled in preferences.)
  • Navigation gestures like swipe to go back
Last update:
  • document, saved state, reopening next launch
  • windows, single or all desktop
  • playlists - global / shared, savable
  • updated UI:Finder status, contextual menus
  • viewing history,
  • updated preferences: auto hide title
  • updated about box: build, version, history
